title: Facile synthesis of MnO/NC nanohybrids toward high-efficiency ORR for zinc–air battery
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24031-24038
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04237A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qingxi Zhuang, Chengjun Hu, Weiting Zhu, Gao Cheng, Meijie Chen, Ziyuan Wang, Shijing Cai, Litu Li, Zier Jin, Qiang Wang
The MnO/NC nanohybrids were synthesized via a facile hydrothermal-pyrolysis strategy, showing enhanced ORR activity and promising ZAB performance.
